ygData.subject: Re: Paw of Opalla(SPOILER) and other observations
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I ve never killed Mitty the Kitty but have been there to case the joint and seen her killed by three different soloists or groups.  Her official lvl is
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

I've never killed Mitty the Kitty but have been there to case the joint
and seen her killed by three different soloists or groups. Her official
lvl is under 20 but being a named cat you know she is tougher. I've
seen her solo'd by a 50 shaman and a 34 wizard, and a group of a 29 and
19 druids. I'm told she has 800 hp's and the lvl 12 priestesses about
230 hp's. Never saw anyone there except the 19 druid that was getting
xp.

The problem is the priestesses will heal Mitty, and there are about half
a dozen of them. I was told the priestesses were a few worries for the
lvl 19 druid. Medding invis is a bonus we don't have.

Basically to camp Mitty, you need enough mustard to blast and bash for
2000 pts every 18 1/2 minutes. Don't ask me how to prime the pump cause
I was never there to see how difficult killing the whole lot is.

I've heard rumours these NPC casters have unlimited mana. Didn't
believe it untill i was at unrest and my 27 cleric and a 29 druid took
on a lvl 29 hag of some desription at the end of a train returning to
the station. Lucky for us it was kill stolen cause both of us were
under two bubbles of health by the time it was killed. The hag also had
time to put several spells into the other two PC's that were
helping/kill stealing. It this situation I'd say helping. :-)

Another curiosity I'd like to mention. I have a 27 Cleric on the Rathe
at the request of personal friends that complain of a lack of high lvl
Clerics on that server. I've just started up a character on the
Tribunal and have noticed a lack of high lvl clerics there as well when
i do searches. Is it just me or is just damn difficult to lvl up a
cleric? Its tough to solo a cleric and good groups are hard to luck
upon. Joining groups in unrest was getting me killed enough to break
even on xp.

Another peeve is asking warriors and monks if they want to team up and
being denied, followed by a request for a heal. I lvl up faster soloing
but can i get a heal while you are here? I'm going to attack this
Dervish thug with one bar of health and put you in a situation of
healing a stranger or watching that stranger die.

I'm afraid I'm going to be one surly dwarf cleric by the time I hit lvl
49. If i know you and like you, happy to help. Strangers, hope you
made a good name with other clerics along the way, cause I'm here to
play the game. If you want true charity workers, go to the Salvation
Army. :-)

Abnuo on the Rathe


Mikaela wrote:
>
> From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
>
> My understanding is that she is around level 30. I hear her spells hit for
> between 60 - 80 dmg and she has about 700 hps. She spawns every 18 and 1/2
> minutes, I am also told. If this is incorrect, someone please correct me.
> :))
>
> Mik
>
>
